TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TraceSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class TraceSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 設定 ASP.NET 追蹤服務。

span.span: Configures the ASP.NET trace service.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供方法來以程式設計方式存取和修改組態檔的內容`trace`> 一節。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the content of the configuration file `trace` section. ASP.NET 追蹤功能與控制如何收集、 儲存，並顯示追蹤結果，會設定追蹤 > 一節。The trace section configures the ASP.NET trace functionality and controls how trace results are gathered, stored, and displayed. 當啟用追蹤時，每個頁面要求會產生可以附加網頁輸出或儲存在應用程式的追蹤記錄檔中的追蹤訊息。When tracing is enabled, each page request generates trace messages that can be appended to the page output or stored in an application trace log. 您可以使用 ASP.NET 追蹤檢視器 (Trace.axd) 來檢視追蹤記錄的內容。You can use the ASP.NET trace viewer (Trace.axd) to view the contents of the trace log. > [!NOTE] > 在 Machine.config 檔案和 Web.config 檔案中的組態階層 > 一節中允許的項目。The element is allowed in the section of the configuration hierarchy in the Machine.config file and the Web.config files. 不允許在網頁子目錄的組態檔中。It is not allowed in configuration files of Web subdirectories. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用型別。The following code example shows how to use the type. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection2/CS/tracesection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection2/VB/tracesection.vb#1)]

The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MostRecent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定數值，表示新收到的要求是否一定要存放在伺服器上。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the most recent requests are always stored on the server.

value.span: 如果新收到的要求一定是存放在追蹤記錄檔內，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the most recent requests are always stored in the trace log; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要求會儲存在追蹤記錄檔到達時，最多的要求中指定的順序屬性。Requests are stored in the trace log in the order they arrive, up to the number of requests specified in the property. 當達到要求限制和是`true`、 會自動捨棄較舊的要求和記錄檔中加入新的要求會繼續。When the request limit is reached and is `true`, older requests are automatically discarded and new requests continue to be added to the log. 當達到要求限制和是`false`，新的要求會被捨棄，直到先前的要求會從記錄檔，或要求限制已增加。When the request limit is reached and is `false`, new requests are discarded until earlier requests are removed from the log or the request limit is increased. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection2#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection2/CS/tracesection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection2#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.TraceSection2/VB/tracesection.vb#4)]

span.span: if the trace information is appended to each page; otherwise, .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Properties As ConfigurationPropertyCollection
public: property int RequestLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定數值，表示 ASP.NET 儲存此應用程式的追蹤資訊時，最多可以記錄多少筆要求。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum number of requests to the application for which ASP.NET stores trace information.

value.span: 存放在伺服器上的要求數量上限。

span.span: The maximum number of requests to store on the server.
The default is 10.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要求上限是 10,000。The maximum request limit is 10,000. 如果指定的值大於 10000，它會以無訊息模式無條件捨去至 10,000 asp.net。If a value greater than 10,000 is specified, it is silently rounded down to 10,000 by ASP.NET. 屬性會取得或設定值，這個值可判斷儲存在伺服器上的要求是否為最新的要求或到達第一個要求。The property gets or sets a value that determines whether the requests stored on the server are the most recent requests or the first requests to arrive. **請注意**當要求數目超過這個設定所加諸的限制和是`false`，沒有其他要求會儲存在追蹤記錄檔。**Note** When the number of requests exceeds the limit imposed by this setting and is `false`, no more requests are stored in the trace log. 如果是`true`、 最新的要求儲存此設定所加諸的限制，而且會捨棄較舊的要求。If is `true`, the most recent requests are stored up to the limit imposed by this setting and older requests are discarded. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. value.span: 如果追蹤訊息會傳送給 類別，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the trace messages are sent to the class; otherwise, .
The default is .
